name: Crap Shoot (LazyBriefcase)
description:
You are an unsuccessful genius inventor who is jealous of his wealthy neighbor, Chad. Chad must pay for being so wealthy and successful! You decide to create a feces flinging flintlock to make the wealthy worthless. You barge into Chad's home and begin firing.

• WASD to move

• Left mouse button to fire

• Stand near toilet to get more ammo

• Shoot everything!
